data.meta_description:
Hi, I have pledged to heal 100 people absolutely free and I am on a mission to heal at least a person a day :)

You are invited to attend a Free Healing‚Ä¶
data.text:
Within us lies a colorful spectrum of energy centers, the seven chakras. Rooted at the base of the spine, the Root Chakra grounds us, fostering stability and security. Moving upwards, the Sacral Chakra ignites creativity and passion, while the Solar Plexus Chakra empowers our confidence and willpower. The Heart Chakra, at the center, nurtures love and compassion. Ascending, the Throat Chakra encourages honest expression and hence growth, the Third Eye Chakra (between our eyes) enhances intuition, and the Crown Chakra connects us to the divine. Balancing these chakras harmonizes our physical, emotional, and spiritual selves, fostering vitality, inner peace, and holistic well-being. In my series of free webinars today I invite you to attend a free 45 minute Zoom session where I will balance these chakras and activate them . Date : 3rd May Time : 3-3:45 pm Join Zoom Meeting https://lnkd.in/g3CAAWqe Meeting ID: 476 144 5143 Passcode: 1DVCZk For updates and details about free future sessions, Join the WhatsApp group now by clicking https://lnkd.in/g_mRWQuV Feel free to extend this invite to anyone, who you think might benefit üôèüèº Live Life Large - An Initiative by Sonia Agarwal

Hi, As a part of my humble initiative to extend my healing and life coaching services to maximum number of people, I have pledged to hold 20 free sessions in the month of May. Make use of this opportunity and experience this ancient healing technique and feel the difference. You are invited to attend a Free Healing Session with me on zoom for 45 min where I promise a deep cleansing experience with tears of joy and a sense of relief that you truly have to experience to believe. Whether you're looking for relaxation, rejuvenation, or just a moment of peace, this session has something for everyone Date : 1st May Time : 3-3:45 pm For Zoom link, Join the WhatsApp group (link in bio) now by clicking https://lnkd.in/g_mRWQuV Feel free to extend this invite to anyone, who you think might benefit üôèüèº Live Life Large - An Initiative by Sonia Agarwal
